TopicTitle: Listen to Maxmaps on Radio Destructoid

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/106EkGD"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/2ad3b8ba3d2d214771945f69f7a5ddfe/tumblr_inline_neaqsfamoS1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p><span>Our very own <strong>Maxmaps</strong> recently guested on <strong>Radio<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></strong></span><strong><span class="profileLink">Destructoid</span></strong><span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>and that episode is now here for your listening pleasure! What kind of KSP tidbits will he dish out? Find out <a href="http://bit.ly/106EkGD"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.<br/></span></p>

Great interview. Really good bit on how to handle the community's expectations vs. Squad's plan for KSP. Liked what I heard about how the Kerbal experience thing went down, so good to hear that community reactions are taken into such consideration but are not a driving force of development; I couldn't have asked for a better way to put that.
Yeah good interview, (and I enjoyed Max's song choice).
That's one poorly designed website. Where is the play button?

That's one poorly designed website. Where is the play button?

I can't find it either...

Really, does anyone know?

The website is borked indeed. I downloaded the interview from the site, it was the only way I could get it going.

Look about halfway down the page, there's a download link.

Actually scratch that, I'm on the page, may as well just copy the link.

http://traffic.libsyn.com/communitoid/Radio_D_048.mp3
